description.ko: FLORA-9는 생물학적 진화와 합성 지능의 합성을 나타내며, DNA가 빛나는 코드로, 탄소가 수정 같은 데이터 구조로 대체된 식물 표본을 보여줍니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 represents the synthesis of biological evolution and synthetic intelligence, showcasing a botanical specimen where DNA has been replaced by luminous code and carbon by crystalline data structures.

prompt: A hyper-realistic macro photograph of a bioluminescent cyber-flower, petals made of translucent liquid glass with integrated glowing microchips and gold circuitry, fiber-optic pollen strands emitting a soft blue aura, surrounded by floating holographic particles and geometric fractals, dark futuristic forest background, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, digital nature aesthetic.
